-
2
The Apothecary is Eirin's unique building, replacing the Zoo. In addition to increasing [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] by making citizens healthier, the medicine it distributes increases the generation of [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great People, and provides slots for citizens to work as Scientists (hurrying your generation of Great Scientists even more!)
